title: Arcade 6.0 Update
body:
Fixes #6119

### Context
This is to get MSBuild on [arcade powered source-build](https://github.com/dotnet/source-build/tree/master/Documentation/planning/arcade-powered-source-build).

### Changes Made
Ran `darc update-dependencies --source-repo arcade --channel ".NET Eng - Latest"`

### Testing
CI is enough.

### Notes
Needed to create a new PR to start using the ".net eng - latest" channel.

The only manual updates were from commits 2 and 3. Commit 1 was entirely automated.

commit.message: run darc update-dependencies --source-repo arcade --channel '.NET Eng - Latest'
Update dotnet cli version to 6.0.100 matching the arcade update
